Favicon | the one on website’s tab

Tonight I want to add an icon on my blog’s tab. Thanks to stackoverflow, I know how to apply it to my websites.

  1. First of all, you need an icon file with .ico format.
  2. Then you add this <link rel="shortcut icon" href="your icon's link"> to your webpage’s <head>
